title: Formative Assessment and Feedback Strategies for Strengthening Scientific Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Psychobiology-themed curriculum utilizing VR simulations. Learners are office/administrative professionals required to apply scientific knowledge to job roles

learning_goals: Learners can analyze science concepts with over 85% accuracy through 60+ True/False items in a VR simulation environment
Learners can correct over 90% of incorrect items using detailed explanatory feedback provided after formative assessment.
Learners can self-assess a 30% or greater improvement in their ability to apply scientific knowledge compared to pre-assessment through two or more formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
